lore: Streaking into battle as barely perceived blurs, Shroud Runners effortlessly outmanoeuvre their enemies while harassing them with pinpoint sniper fire. Each jetbike acts as the mount for a pair of skilled Aeldari Rangers, the pillion rider often entering a marksmanâ€™s trance so as to aim and fire while travelling at incredible speeds.

otherAbilities.Target Acquisition:: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this unit. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by friendly AELDARI models have the [LETHAL HITS] ability when targeting that unit.
